def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_small_grey = is_small(x, ctx) and is_grey(x, ctx) and is_medium_size(x, ctx)
        check_y_larger_medium_grey = is_larger(y, x, ctx) and is_grey(y, ctx) and is_medium_size(y, ctx)
        check_y_right_south_x = is_right(y, x, ctx) and is_below(y, x, ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_small_grey
            and check_y_larger_medium_grey
            and check_y_right_south_x
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
